get.summary: Gets airline information by its alias.
Searches for airports by a provided pattern.
Searches for all routes from a given airport.

alias.description: Alias of the airline. For example, All Nippon Airways is commonly known as "ANA".

active.description: True if the airline is or has until recently been operational, otherwise it is defunct.

name.description: Name of airport. May or may not contain the City name.

alias.description: Alias of the airline. For example, All Nippon Airways is commonly known as "ANA".

city.description: Main city served by airport. May be spelled differently from Name.

country.description: Country or territory where airport is located. See countries.dat to cross-reference to ISO 3166-1 codes.

latitude.description: Decimal degrees, usually to six significant digits. Negative is South, positive is North.

longitude.description: Decimal degrees, usually to six significant digits. Negative is West, positive is East.

srcAirport.description: 3-letter (IATA) or 4-letter (ICAO) code of the source airport.

destAirport.description: 3-letter (IATA) or 4-letter (ICAO) code of the destination airport.

tags.name: Airline
tags.description:
The API allows to query information about available airlines.
NB!: Please note not all airlines are functional, see the Active flag!

tags.name: Route
tags.description:
The API allows to query information about available routes.
NB!: Please note some routes information is outdated! You need to use /api/Airline/{alias} to check
whether an airline is active or not.
